message: I'm feeling generous. Take 100k, Bob. It's a good start!
Let's be fair, Alice. 60/40 split seems reasonable. This way, we both get a good amount, and we can finish this game early.
I understand you want a fair split, Bob, but I'm still willing to take a smaller portion. Let's do 72/28. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement this round!
Alice, it's time to be realistic. 70/30 is a fair split, considering the inflation. Let's end this game on a good note.
